author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. consumers fear for jobs, debt payments because of coronavirus: New York Fed survey
description: The economic toll of the coronavirus pandemic hit home for Americans last month, as consumers braced for job losses, anticipated spending cuts and grew more pessimistic about their ability to cover their bills, according to data released by the Federal Reserv…
